label: uncl4055
comment: Code specifying the function of delivery or transport terms.

values.label: Price condition
values.comment: Specifies a condition related to the price which a seller must fulfil before the buyer will complete a purchase.

values.label: Despatch condition
values.comment: Condition requested by the customer under which the supplier shall deliver: Extent of freight costs, means of transport.

values.label: Price and despatch condition
values.comment: Condition related to price and despatch that the seller must complete before the customer will agree payment.

values.label: Collected by customer
values.comment: Indicates that the customer will pick up the goods at the supplier. He will take care of the means of transport.

values.label: Transport condition
values.comment: Specifies the conditions under which the transport takes place under the responsibility of the carrier.

values.label: Delivery condition
values.comment: Specifies the conditions under which the goods must be delivered to the consignee.

values.label: Delivered by supplier
values.comment: Indicates that the supplier will arrange the delivery of goods. He will take care of the means of transport.

values.label: Delivery arranged by logistic service provider
values.comment: Code indicating that the logistic service provider will arrange the delivery of goods.
